remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 路径可以是相对路径或完整，因为可能出现冲突的作用域和指定的路径。Because WMI paths can be relative or full, a conflict between the scope and the path specified may arise. 但是，如果已指定的范围，并且指定了相对的 WMI 路径，则不会发生冲突。However, if a scope is specified and a relative WMI path is specified, then there is no conflict. 以下是一些可能发生的冲突：The following are some possible conflicts: 如果未指定的范围，并且指定了相对的 WMI 路径，则范围将默认为本地计算机的。If a scope is not specified and a relative WMI path is specified, then the scope will default to the local machine's . 如果未指定一个作用域和指定完整的 WMI 路径，然后在负载测试作用域将被推断的完整路径的作用域部分。If a scope is not specified and a full WMI path is specified, then the scope will be inferred from the scope portion of the full path. 例如，完整的 WMI 路径：`\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc'`将表示 WMI 对象 MyClass.Name='abc"作用域中\\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace。For example, the full WMI path: `\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc'` will represent the WMI object 'MyClass.Name='abc'" in the scope '\\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace'. 如果已指定的范围，并且指定完整的 WMI 路径，作用域将替代的完整路径的作用域部分。If a scope is specified and a full WMI path is specified, then the scope will override the scope portion of the full path. 例如，如果指定以下作用域：\\指定 \MyMachine\root\MyScope 和以下的完整路径： \\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc，然后查找以下`object: \\MyMachine\root\MyScope:MyClass.Name= 'abc'`（作用域完整路径的一部分将忽略）。For example, if the following scope was specified: \\\MyMachine\root\MyScope, and the following full path was specified: \\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc', then look for the following `object: \\MyMachine\root\MyScope:MyClass.Name= 'abc'` (the scope part of the full path is ignored). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## summary.span: 获取或设置对象的 WMI 路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the object's WMI path.
A representing the object's path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理对象已绑定到特定命名空间会释放原始的 WMI 对象中的 WMI 对象后，请更改该属性。Changing the property after the management object has been bound to a WMI object in a particular namespace results in releasing the original WMI object. 这将导致要重新绑定到指定的新路径属性和作用域值的新对象的管理对象。This causes the management object to be rebound to the new object specified by the new path properties and scope values. 重新绑定是以"迟缓"方式，即，仅当时执行请求的值需要要绑定到 WMI 对象的管理对象。The rebinding is performed in a "lazy" manner, that is, only when a requested value requires the management object to be bound to the WMI object. 然后再尝试重新绑定 （例如，同时修改的作用域和路径属性），可以对多个仅将该属性进行更改。Changes can be made to more than just the property before attempting to rebind (for example, modifying the scope and path properties simultaneously). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化的新实例类默认命名空间，然后将更改的 WMI 路径。The following example initializes a new instance of the class with the default namespace, and then changes the WMI path of the . [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementObject_Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementObject_Path/cs/ManagementObject_Path.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementObject_Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementObject_Path/vb/ManagementObject_Path.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理对象已绑定到特定命名空间会释放原始的 WMI 对象中的 WMI 对象之后，请更改此属性。Changing this property after the management object has been bound to a WMI object in a particular namespace results in releasing the original WMI object. 这将导致要重新绑定到指定的新路径属性和作用域值的新对象的管理对象。This causes the management object to be rebound to the new object specified by the new path properties and scope values. 重新绑定是以"迟缓"方式，即，仅当时执行请求的值需要要绑定到 WMI 对象的管理对象。The rebinding is performed in a "lazy" manner, that is, only when a requested value requires the management object to be bound to the WMI object. 然后再尝试重新绑定 （例如，同时修改的作用域和路径属性），可以对远不止此属性进行更改。Changes can be made to more than just this property before attempting to rebind (for example, modifying the scope and path properties simultaneously). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化的新实例类默认命名空间，然后将更改的作用域。The following example initializes a new instance of the class with the default namespace, and then changes the scope of the .
